org.opengis.cite.cat30

Class ReusableEntityFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sun.jersey.api.client.filter.ClientFilter
      • org.opengis.cite.cat30.ReusableEntityFilter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.sun.jersey.api.client.ClientHandler

    public class ReusableEntityFilter
extends com.sun.jersey.api.client.filter.ClientFilter
    Buffers the (response) entity so it can be read multiple times.

    WARNING: The entity InputStream must be reset after each read attempt.
